member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterColorConverter
member.summary: Converts between LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterColor and System.Drawing (GDI+) System.Drawing.Color objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterColorConverter.FromColor(Color)
member.summary: Converts a System.Drawing (GDI+) System.Drawing.Color object to a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterColor object.
member.param: The source System.Drawing (GDI+) color.
member.returns: The corresponding LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterColor object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterColorConverter.ToColor(Leadtools.RasterColor)
member.summary: Converts a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterColor object to a System.Drawing (GDI+) System.Drawing.Color object.
member.param: The source LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterColor color.
member.returns: The System.Drawing (GDI+) System.Drawing.Color object.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterGraphics
member.summary: Represents a GDI+ System.Drawing.Graphics object using a Leadtools.RasterImage as the display surface.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterGraphics.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all the resources used by this RasterGraphics.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterGraphics.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases all the resources used by this RasterGraphics.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterGraphics.Finalize
member.summary: This member overrides System.Object.Finalize.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterGraphics.Graphics
member.summary: Gets the GDI+ System.Drawing.Graphics object that represents the display surface of the Leadtools.RasterImage.
member.value: A GDI+ System.Drawing.Graphics object that represents the display surface of the Leadtools.RasterImage.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImageConverter
member.summary: Converts a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage to and from GDI and GDI+ image objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImageConverter.ChangeFromEmf(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes a Windows Enhanced Metafile (EMF) into a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object and, if successful, frees the Enhanced Metafile.
member.param: Handle to the EMF to be changed.
Amount by which to scale the enhanced metafile's original width.
Amount by which to scale the enhanced metafile's original height.
member.returns: The newly created Leadtools.RasterImage object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImageConverter.ChangeFromEmf(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,Leadtools.RasterColor)
member.summary: Changes a Windows Enhanced Metafile (EMF) into a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object and, if successful, frees the Enhanced Metafile.
member.param: Handle to the EMF to be changed.
Amount by which to scale the enhanced metafile's original width.
Amount by which to scale the enhanced metafile's original height.
The color to use to fill the image area before painting the metafile objects.
member.returns: The newly created Leadtools.RasterImage object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImageConverter.ChangeFromHBitmap(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Changes a Windows Device-Dependent Bitmap (DDB) to a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object.
member.param: Handle to the DDB to be changed.
Handle to the palette. This value can be IntPtr.Zero if the \hbitmap\ parameter refers to a bitmap that is greater than 8 bits, or if the bitmap will use the system palette.
member.returns: The newly created Leadtools.RasterImage object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImageConverter.ChangeFromHBitmap(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Changes a Windows Device-Dependent Bitmap (DDB) to a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object.
member.param: Handle to the device responsible for the conversion. The mapping mode of the device context must be MM_TEXT.
Handle to the DDB to be changed.
Handle to the palette. This value can be IntPtr.Zero if the \hdc\ parameter refers to a device that is greater than 8 bits, or if the bitmap will use the system palette.
member.returns: The newly create Leadtools.RasterImage object.

Amount by which to scale the metafiles original height.

Fails if the image is palletized.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter
member.summary: Support for painting a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage using GDI and GDI+ platforms.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.CreateGraphics(Leadtools.RasterImage)
member.summary: Creates a GDI+ System.Drawing.Graphics object using this Leadtools.RasterImage as the display surface.
member.param: The source image.
member.returns: The GDI+ System.Drawing.Graphics object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.CreateLeadDC(Leadtools.RasterImage)
member.summary: Creates a Windows GDI device context using this Leadtools.RasterImage as the display surface.
member.param: The source image.
member.returns: The Windows HDC object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.DeleteLeadDC(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Deletes the device context that was created using the CreateLeadDC method.
member.param: Handle to a device context that was created using the CreateLeadDC method.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.FillRegion(Leadtools.RasterImage,Graphics,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm,Leadtools.RasterColor)
member.summary: Highlights a region by displaying a filled, color representation of the region in the given System.Drawing.Graphics object.
member.param: The source image.
Graphics object where the image is displayed and where the frame is to appear.
Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates.

The color value to be XORed with colors within a region to determine the new colors for displaying the region. The color corresponding to a particular part of the region is determined as follows: `Region Color Displayed = (color of pixel in region) XOR (crRgnColor)`

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.FillRegion(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.IntPtr,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm,Leadtools.RasterColor)
member.summary: Highlights a region by displaying a filled, color representation of the region in the given Windows device context handle.
member.param: The source image.
Windows device context handle where the image is displayed and where the frame is to appear.
Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates.

The color value to be XORed with colors within a region to determine the new colors for displaying the region. The color corresponding to a particular part of the region is determined as follows: `Region Color Displayed = (color of pixel in region) XOR (crRgnColor)`

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.FrameRegion(System.IntPtr,Graphics,System.Int32)
member.summary: Displays an outline of the Windows HRGN in the given System.Drawing.Graphics object.
member.param: Windows HRGN object.
System.Drawing.Graphics object where the frame is to appear.
Zero-index of the frame to display. Possible values are from 0 to MaxRegionFrameIndex. You can animate the region frame by cycling between these values.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.FrameRegion(Leadtools.RasterImage,Graphics,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm,System.Int32)
member.summary: Displays an outline of the image region in the given System.Drawing.Graphics object.
member.param: The source image.
System.Drawing.Graphics object where the image is displayed and where the frame is to appear.
Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates.
Zero-index of the frame to display. Possible values are from 0 to MaxRegionFrameIndex. You can animate the region frame by cycling between these values.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.FrameRegion(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.IntPtr,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm,System.Int32)
member.summary: Displays an outline of the image region in the given Windows device context handle.
member.param: The source image.
Windows device context handle where the image is displayed and where the frame is to appear.
Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates.
Zero-index of the frame to display. Possible values are from 0 to MaxRegionFrameIndex. You can animate the region frame by cycling between these values.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.GetPaintColors(Leadtools.RasterImage,Graphics)
member.summary: Returns a palette corresponding to this Leadtools.RasterImage if painted on the given graphics object.
member.param: The source image.
The graphics object on which this image is painted.
member.returns: An array of color for the palette

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.GetPaintHPalette(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Returns a Windows palette handle corresponding to this Leadtools.RasterImage if painted on the given device context.
member.param: The source image.
The device context object on which this Leadtools.RasterImage is painted.
member.returns: A Windows palette handle (HPALETTE). You must delete this palette with the Windows DeleteObject API after using it.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.GetPaintPalette(Leadtools.RasterImage,Graphics)
member.summary: Returns a GDI+ palette corresponding to this Leadtools.RasterImage if painted on the given graphic object.
member.param: The source image.
The graphics object on which this Leadtools.RasterImage is painted.
member.returns: a GDI+ palette

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.Paint(Leadtools.RasterImage,Graphics,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties)
member.summary: Displays this Leadtools.RasterImage in the given System.Drawing.Graphics object.
member.param: The source image.
The destination System.Drawing.Graphics object where the image will be displayed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the part of the image to use as the display source.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the portion of the display source to paint. Generally, this is used for updating the display when part of the source image has changed.
Leadtools.LeadRect

A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the portion of the display rectangle to paint. Generally, this is used for updating changes in the display surface, such as when a user moves another window, uncovering a part of the image that had been covered up.
Options for the display.

Leadtools.LeadRect
Options for the display.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.PaintBuffer(Leadtools.RasterImage,Graphics,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties)
member.summary: Paints image data from a buffer into a System.Drawing.Graphics object.
member.param: The source image.
The destination System.Drawing.Graphics object where the image data will be displayed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the part of the image to use as the display source.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object specifies the portion of the display source to paint. Generally, this is used for updating the display when part of the source image has changed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that determines how the source rectangle is scaled and how the image is positioned in the destination \graphics\ object.

A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the portion of the display rectangle to paint. Generally, this is used for updating changes in the display surface, such as when a user moves another window, uncovering a part of the image that had been covered up.
The buffer that contains the image data to paint
Offset into \buffer\ where the data starts.
The first row to paint. The painted portion of any row may be limited by the rectangle parameters.
The number of rows to paint. The painted portion of any row may be limited by the rectangle parameters.
Options for the display.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.PaintBuffer(Leadtools.RasterImage,Graphics,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties)
member.summary: Paints image data from an unmanaged memory buffer into a System.Drawing.Graphics object.
member.param: The source image.
The destination System.Drawing.Graphics object where the image data will be displayed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the part of the image to use as the display source.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object specifies the portion of the display source to paint. Generally, this is used for updating the display when part of the source image has changed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that determines how the source rectangle is scaled and how the image is positioned in the destination \graphics\ object.

A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the portion of the display rectangle to paint. Generally, this is used for updating changes in the display surface, such as when a user moves another window, uncovering a part of the image that had been covered up.
Pointer to the unmanaged memory buffer that contains the image data to paint
The first row to paint. The painted portion of any row may be limited by the rectangle parameters.
The number of rows to paint. The painted portion of any row may be limited by the rectangle parameters.
Options for the display.

member.summary: Paints image data from a buffer into a Windows device context handle.

The destination Windows device context handle where the image data will be displayed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the part of the image to use as the display source.

A Leadtools.LeadRect object that determines how the source rectangle is scaled and how the image is positioned in the destination \hdc\ handle.

A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the portion of the display rectangle to paint. Generally, this is used for updating changes in the display surface, such as when a user moves another window, uncovering a part of the image that had been covered up.

Offset into \buffer\ where the data starts.
The first row to paint. The painted portion of any row may be limited by the rectangle parameters.

Options for the display.

member.summary: Paints image data from an unmanaged memory buffer into a Windows device context handle.
member.param: The source image.
The destination Windows device context handle where the image data will be displayed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the part of the image to use as the display source.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object specifies the portion of the display source to paint. Generally, this is used for updating the display when part of the source image has changed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that determines how the source rectangle is scaled and how the image is positioned in the destination \hdc\ handle.

A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the portion of the display rectangle to paint. Generally, this is used for updating changes in the display surface, such as when a user moves another window, uncovering a part of the image that had been covered up.
Pointer to the unmanaged memory buffer that contains the image data to paint
The first row to paint. The painted portion of any row may be limited by the rectangle parameters.
The number of rows to paint. The painted portion of any row may be limited by the rectangle parameters.
Options for the display.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.PaintCmykPlanes(Leadtools.RasterImage,Graphics,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties,System.Object)
member.summary: Displays the CMYK planes stored in the image in the given System.Drawing.Graphics object.
member.param: The source image.
The destination System.Drawing.Graphics object where the CMYK planes will be displayed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the part of the image to use as the display source.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object specifies the portion of the display source to paint. Generally, this is used for updating the display when part of the source image has changed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that determines how the source rectangle is scaled and how the image is positioned in the destination \graphics\ object.

A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the portion of the display rectangle to paint. Generally, this is used for updating changes in the display surface, such as when a user moves another window, uncovering a part of the image that had been covered up.
Options for the display.
Optional RasterColorConverter object used to convert CMYK data to BGR during painting. Pass null (Nothing in VB) to let LEADTOOLS use the built-in color conversion functions.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.PaintCmykPlanes(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.IntPtr,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties,System.Object)
member.summary: Displays the CMYK planes stored in the image in the given Windows device context handle.
member.param: The source image.
The destination Windows device context handle where the CMYK planes will be displayed.

A Leadtools.LeadRect object specifies the portion of the display source to paint. Generally, this is used for updating the display when part of the source image has changed.
A Leadtools.LeadRect object that determines how the source rectangle is scaled and how the image is positioned in the destination \hdc\ handle.

A Leadtools.LeadRect object that specifies the portion of the display rectangle to paint. Generally, this is used for updating changes in the display surface, such as when a user moves another window, uncovering a part of the image that had been covered up.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.PaintOverlay(Leadtools.RasterImage,Graphics,System.Int32,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties)
member.summary: Paints the overlay at the specified index. Use this method to paint overlays that are not automatically painted.
member.param: The source image.
The destination graphics object where the image will be displayed.

The index of the overlay used for painting. The overlay should have an image. If the overlay is embedded into an image bitplane, make sure you create an overlay image prior to calling this method. This index is zero-based.
Rectangle which determines the portion of the image to paint.
Rectangle which further clips the source image.
Rectangle which determines where the image is placed, and how it is scaled.
Rectangle which clips the image display.
Options for the display.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.PaintOverlay(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.IntPtr,System.Int32,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.LeadRect,Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties)
member.summary: Paints the overlay at the specified index. Use this method to paint overlays that are not automatically painted.
member.param: The source image.
The destination device context where the image will be displayed.

The index of the overlay used for painting. The overlay should have an image. If the overlay is embedded into an image bitplane, make sure you create an overlay image prior to calling this method. This index is zero-based.
Rectangle which determines the portion of the image to paint.
Rectangle which further clips the source image.
Rectangle which determines where the image is placed, and how it is scaled.
Rectangle which clips the image display.
Options for the display.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePainter.MaxRegionFrameIndex
member.summary: Gets the maximum region frame index.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintCallbacks
member.summary: The RasterPaintCallbacks class is used to implement custom painting. The RasterPaintProperties.PaintCallbacks property contains a list of such classes.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintCallbacks.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new RasterPaintCallbacks class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintCallbacks.SetCallback(Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction,Leadtools.Drawing.PaintCallbackDelegate)
member.summary: Adds a callback to the RasterPaintProperties.PaintCallbacks member.
member.param: The type of callback to add.
The callback function.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo
member.summary: This class describes the image data expected by the custom paint callbacks. It is used with the RasterPaintCallbacks callbacks.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new RasterPaintDibInfo class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.Default
member.summary: Fills the RasterPaintCallbacks class with the default settings.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Set or get the default bits per pixel of the data expected by the graphics device.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.BytesPerLine
member.summary: Gets the expected stride (number of bytes per line).
member.value: This is usually the number of bytes rounded up to a multiple of 4 bytes.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.Flags
member.summary: Collection of flags indicating various options for the bitmap.
member.value: See the RasterPaintDibInfoFlags enumeration for possible values.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.HighBit
member.summary: Indicates the high bit of the image data (valid only for grayscale 12 or 16-bit data).
member.value: Valid values are LowBit through BitsPerPixel - 1.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.LowBit
member.summary: Indicates the low bit of the image data (valid only for grayscale 12 or 16-bit data).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.Order
member.summary: Indicates the data order (grayscale, BGR, RGB, etc).
member.value: See the Leadtools.RasterByteOrder enumeration for valid values.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.PlaneCount
member.summary: Indicates whether the image data should be interleaved or planar.
member.value: This is usually 1. If the image data is supposed to be planar, it can be the number of planes. It should be positive in any case.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.ViewPerspective
member.summary: Indicates the expected orientation of the image data.
member.value: See the Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective enumeration for possible values.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterRegionConverter
member.summary: Converts between a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion and GDI HRGN and System.Drawing (GDI+) System.Drawing.Region objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterRegionConverter.AddGdiDataToRegion(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm,System.Byte[],System.Int32,Leadtools.RasterRegionCombineMode)
member.summary: Creates or updates a LEADTOOLS image region using the specified GDI+ region data.
member.param: The source image.

Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates. If you specify **null** (**Nothing** in VB) for this parameter, the scalar fields default to 1, the offsets default to 0, and the view perspective defaults to the image view perspective.
An array of System.Byte that defines the region to add.
Byte offset into \data\ where the data starts.
The action to take regarding the existing image region, if one is defined.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterRegionConverter.AddGdiPlusDataToRegion(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm,RegionData,Leadtools.RasterRegionCombineMode)
member.summary: Creates or updates a LEADTOOLS image region using the specified GDI+ region data.
member.param: The source image.

Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates. If you specify **null** (**Nothing** in VB) for this parameter, the scalar fields default to 1, the offsets default to 0, and the view perspective defaults to the image view perspective.
A System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData object that defines the region to add.
The action to take regarding the existing image region, if one is defined.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterRegionConverter.AddRegionToRegion(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm,System.IntPtr,Leadtools.RasterRegionCombineMode)
member.summary: Creates or updates a LEADTOOLS image region by adding the specified Windows region handle.
member.param: The source image.

Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates. If you specify null (Nothing in VB) in this parameter, the scalar fields default to 1, the offsets default to 0, and the view perspective defaults to the image view perspective.
The Windows region handle to add.
The action to take regarding the existing image region, if one is defined.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterRegionConverter.AddRegionToRegion(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm,Region,Leadtools.RasterRegionCombineMode)
member.summary: Creates or updates a LEADTOOLS image region by adding the specified GDI+ region.
member.param: The source image.

Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates. If you specify null (Nothing in VB) in this parameter, the scalar fields default to 1, the offsets default to 0, and the view perspective defaults to the image view perspective.
The GDI+ region to add.
The action to take regarding the existing image region, if one is defined.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterRegionConverter.ConvertFromRegion(Region)
member.summary: Converts a System.Drawing (GDI+) System.Drawing.Region object to a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion.
member.param: The source GDI+ region. This parameter cannot be null (Nothing in VB).
member.returns: The LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion object this method creates. You must dispose this object after using it.

member.summary: Converts a GDI HRGN object to a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion.
member.param: The source GDI HRGN object. This parameter cannot be IntPtr.Zero.
member.returns: The LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion object this method creates. You must dispose this object after using it.

member.summary: Converts a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion to a System.Drawing (GDI+) System.Drawing.Region object.
member.param: The source LEADTOOLS region. This parameter cannot be null (Nothing in VB).
Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates.
member.returns: The System.Drawing.Region object this method creates. You must dispose this object after using it.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterRegionConverter.ConvertToRegionHandle(Leadtools.RasterRegion,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm)
member.summary: Converts a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion to a GDI HRGN object.
member.param: The source LEADTOOLS region. This parameter cannot be null (Nothing in VB).
Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates.
member.returns: The GDI HRGN object this method creates. You must delete this object after using it using the Windows DeleteObject API.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterRegionConverter.GetGdiPlusRegionData(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm)
member.summary: Gets the GDI+ data that describes the image region.
member.param: The source image.

Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates. If you specify **null** (**Nothing** in VB) for this parameter, the scalar fields default to 1, the offsets default to 0, and the view perspective defaults to the image view perspective.
member.returns: A System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData object that contains the information that describes the region in this Leadtools.RasterImage object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterRegionConverter.GetGdiRegionData(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm)
member.summary: Gets the GDI data that describes the image region.
member.param: The source image.

Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates. If you specify **null** (**Nothing** in VB) for this parameter, the scalar fields default to 1, the offsets default to 0, and the view perspective defaults to the image view perspective.
member.returns: An array of System.Byte that contains the information that describes the region in this Leadtools.RasterImage object.

member.returns: The newly created Leadtools.IRenderingEngine instance that is ready to be used.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RenderingEngineFactory.Create(Leadtools.RasterImage)
member.summary: Creates a new rendering engine from RasterImage object.
member.param: RasterImage object. This cannot be null.
member.returns: The newly created Leadtools.IRenderingEngine instance that is ready to be used.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.ChangeToImageOptions
member.summary: Options to use when changing a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object to GDI+ System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ChangeToImageOptions.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ChangeToImageOptions.ForceChange
member.summary: If the image is not GDI+ compatible, this flag forces the conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ChangeToImageOptions.NoPalette
member.summary: Fail if the image has a palette.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ChangeToImageOptions.TopLeftAlways
member.summary: Force the image to have RasterViewPerspective.TopLeft view perspective.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.ConvertFromImageOptions
member.summary: Options to use when converting a GDI+ System.Drawing.Bitmap to LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ConvertFromImageOptions.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.ConvertToImageOptions
member.summary: Options to use when converting a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object to GDI+ System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ConvertToImageOptions.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ConvertToImageOptions.InitAlpha
member.summary: Initialize the destination image alpha values if supported (when the result of the conversion is a 32 or 64-bit image). If this flagged is specified, the result image will always have an alpha value of all 1's (255 for 32-bit images or 65535 for 64-bit images) regardless of the alpha values in the source image. This can be useful when converting some 32-bit images that may have 0 for the alpha (such as BMP files) which translates into an GDI+ image that is completely transparent. If this flag is not specified, then the source image alpha values will be used as is.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason
member.summary: Indicates the reason that the LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object is not compatible with GDI+.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.Compatible
member.summary: Image is compatible

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Unsupported Bits/Pixel

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.Order
member.summary: Unsupported color byte order

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.Palette
member.summary: Unsupported palette

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.Data
member.summary: Unsupported raw data

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.ViewPerspective
member.summary: Unsupported view perspective

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.Other
member.summary: Unspecified reason

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.StretchDIBitsCallback

member.summary: This callback replaces the SetViewportOrgEx GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetViewportOrgExCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the GetViewportOrgEx GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.SelectPaletteCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the SelectPalette GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.RealizePaletteCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the RealizePalette GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetMapModeCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the GetMapMode GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.ExtSelectClipRgnCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the ExtSelectClipRgn GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetGraphicsModeCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the GetGraphicsMode GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetWorldTransformCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the GetWorldTransform GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.ConvertLineCallback
member.summary: This callback converts a line of data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetDibInfoCallback
member.summary: This callback provides information on the data expected by the device. See RasterPaintDibInfo for more details.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.PrePaintCallback
member.summary: This callback informs your RasterPaintCallbacks class that it has been selected for painting. It is called before painting starts. Use it to allocate any memory needed for painting.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.PostPaintCallback
member.summary: This callback gets called after painting is finished. Use it to free any memory allocated in PrePaintCallback.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.FillRectCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the FillRect GDI function.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfoFlags
member.summary: Flags that make up RasterPaintDibInfo.Flags.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfoFlags.None
member.summary: No flags are set

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfoFlags.IgnoreLut
member.summary: Ignore the raster image color lookup (LUT) table when performing color conversion. This is valid only for grayscale images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfoFlags.LowHighBitValid
member.summary: LowBit and HighBit members of RasterPaintDibInfo are valid. This is valid only for grayscale images.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags
member.summary: Contains value that controls the speed, quality, and style of painting operations.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.OrderedDither
member.summary: Enables or disables ordered dithering when painting. Ordered dithering is faster than the default dithering method, which uses error diffusion, but the quality of the image is not as good.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.FastPaint
member.summary: Enables or disables fast painting. Fast painting should be performed only if the current video driver is good, and the image does not need to be dithered or resized to paint. No safety check for a faulty driver is performed.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.IndexedPaint
member.summary: Enables or disables painting that is mapped directly to the selected palette. You can this and let Windows do color matching between the paint palette and the selected palette. Indexed painting uses the colors from the currently selected palette. It is not used if the image is not palletized.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.DitheredPaint
member.summary: Enables or disables painting that is mapped directly to the selected palette. This is enabled by default; you can set this flag to disable it and let Windows do color matching between the paint palette and the selected palette. Indexed painting uses the colors from the currently selected palette. It is not used if the image is not palletized.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.ScaleToGray
member.summary: (Document/Medical only) Enables grayscaling of 1-bit images when they are displayed. This improves the readability of the images when they are zoomed in or zoomed out, but it slows down the display.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.HalftonePrint
member.summary: Enables use of the printing halftone (rather than the viewing halftone) when painting to a 1-bit device.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.FavorBlack
member.summary: (Document/Medical only) Enables a bias in preserving black objects when displaying zoomed-out 1-bit images. This can prevent the disappearance of fine lines and details, but it slows down the display.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.FixedPalette
member.summary: Enables the LEAD Fixed palette when displaying 24-bit (or greater) images on 8-bit (or less) devices.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.NetscapePalette
member.summary: Enables the Netscape Fixed palette when displaying 24-bit (or greater) images on 8-bit (or less) devices.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.Resample
member.summary: Enables resample resize when displaying images at zoom factors other than 1:1.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.Bicubic
member.summary: Enables bicubic resize when displaying images at zoom factors other than 1:1.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintEngine
member.summary: Indicates the painting engine to use when rendering images using the Windows GDI or GDI+ engines..

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintEngine.Gdi
member.summary: Use Windows GDI when painting Leadtools.RasterImage objects

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintEngine.GdiPlus
member.summary: Use Windows GDI+ when painting Leadtools.RasterImage objects

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties
member.summary: Controls the speed, quality, and style used when painting a Leadtools.RasterImage object using the Windows GDI or GDI+ engines.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.MakeRasterOperation(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a ROP4 value from the specified foreground and background color values.
member.param: The foreground color.
The background color.
member.returns: The ROP4 value.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.Default
member.summary: Returns a new instance of the RasterPaintProperties structure with all members set to default values.
member.value: The instance of the RasterPaintProperties structure that this property creates.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the opacity to use when painting the Leadtools.RasterImage.
member.value: A value between 0 and 255 representing the opacity level to use when painting the Leadtools.RasterImage. Default value is 255.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PaintCallbacks
member.summary: Gets the list of RasterPaintCallbacks objects containing the custom callbacks.
member.value: A list of RasterPaintCallbacks objects containing custom callbacks.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PaintDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets and sets options that control the speed, quality, and style of painting operations.
member.value: A combination of the RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags enumeration members that control the speed, quality, and style of painting operations.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PaintEngine
member.summary: Gets and sets the paint engine to use when displaying images.
member.value: A RasterPaintEngine enumeration value that specifies the paint engine to use when displaying images.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.RasterOperation
member.summary: Gets or sets the ROP value.
member.value: An integer value that represents the ROP value.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.UsePaintPalette
member.summary: Enables or disables automatically using the Leadtools.RasterImage object palette when displaying the image.
member.value: true to automatically use the Leadtools.RasterImage object palette, false to ignore it.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.UseTransform
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicate wherer to use the current transform in the destination System.Drawing.Graphics object when painting the image and regions.
member.value: **true** to use the current transform in the destination System.Drawing.Graphics object when painting the image and regions, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.Blackness
member.summary: Fills the destination rectangle using the color associated with index 0 in the physical palette. (This color is black for the default physical palette.)

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.DestinationInvert
member.summary: Inverts the destination rectangle.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.MergeCopy
member.summary: Merges the colors of the source rectangle with the brush currently selected in hdcDest, by using the Boolean AND operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.MergePaint
member.summary: Merges the colors of the inverted source rectangle with the colors of the destination rectangle by using the Boolean OR operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.NotSourceCopy
member.summary: Copies the inverted source rectangle to the destination.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.NotSourceErase
member.summary: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean OR operator and then inverts the resultant color.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PatternCopy
member.summary: Copies the brush currently selected in hdcDest, into the destination bitmap.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PatternInvert
member.summary: Combines the colors of the brush currently selected in hdcDest, with the colors of the destination rectangle by using the Boolean XOR operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PatternPaint
member.summary: Combines the colors of the brush currently selected in hdcDest, with the colors of the inverted source rectangle by using the Boolean OR operator. The result of this operation is combined with the colors of the destination rectangle by using the Boolean OR operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.SourceAnd
member.summary: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean AND operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.SourceCopy
member.summary: Copies the source rectangle directly to the destination rectangle.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.SourceErase
member.summary: Combines the inverted colors of the destination rectangle with the colors of the source rectangle by using the Boolean AND operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.SourceInvert
member.summary: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean XOR operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.SourcePaint
member.summary: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean OR operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.Whiteness
member.summary: Fills the destination rectangle using the color associated with index 1 in the physical palette. (This color is white for the default physical palette.)
